title: Global Health Leaders Launch Decade of Vaccines Collaboration
cleaned_text: Global Health Leaders Launch Decade of Vaccines Collaboration | Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation Sign up for The Optimist newsletter Subscribe to The Optimist to get weekly updates on the latest in global health, gender equality, education, and more.
